title: Unable to create app
body:
### Describe the bug

I upgraded `quarkus-cli` to 2.16.5.Final, and I'm unable to create a new app.

```bash
quarkus create app

[ERROR] ❗  Unable to create project: Failed to resolve extension catalog of io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:2.16.5.Final
```

```
quarkus --version

2.16.5.Final
```

This also happens when listing the extensions. `quarkus extension list`



### Expected behavior

I should be able to create a new app with the `quarkus-cli`.


### Actual behavior

I get this error:

`[ERROR] ❗  Unable to create project: Failed to resolve extension catalog of io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:2.16.5.Final`

### How to Reproduce?

1. Install latest version of quarkus-cli
2.  Run `quarkus create app`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin 22.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.3.0

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "19.0.2" 2023-01-17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.5.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
